page.title: 01ERPINGHAM,NORFOLK.
page.content: {GENERAL INFORMATION} THE area under survey is deeply rural,the main settlement being Erpingham in the north east which lies about 3miles north of Aylsham. Arable or mixed farming is the main "industry",mainly cultivated cropland. The village ofErpingham and hamlets of CALTHORPE and THWAITE are vserved by two churches and a chapel. In Erpingham there is a primary school(4-11yrs),a post office and general store,a pub,brewery,village hall,restaurant and scrapyard. Housing consists of a mixture of old and modern houses including a small council estate.Erpingham is a straggling ribbon type development.
